resources.string: This is an academical work designed to show a real implementation of a solver for a CSP \" Constraints Satisfaction Problem \". \n Yeah. Stop talking about boring stuff. \n 1. You must take a photo of the grid of the Sudoku.
Damn! A mistake! Select the right one!

2. If this image is the black grounded grid of your Sudoku we can go on. \n Perhaps if you are awful taking photo you should take it again. \n Remember: \"Strong hand, take the grid, Focus yourself \" (it helps, sometimes)
3. I have to detect digits instead of you. Yeah i don\'t like it. Always numbers. It\'s boring but they said me Engineers love them. Frustrated People. Click Detection for it and then we can go on.
Nope, i\'m not perfect. It\'s possible that you can find detection mistakes. \n People think i\'m perfect SO DON\'T say anything about it. \n Otherwise.. It was your guilt, no doubts!
Yeah, your boring Sudoku was solved. Now you owe me a coffee. (Didn\'t i say it?) You should, you have, you MUST offer me a coffee.
